ModulePrefs.title: Square POS Gadget
ModulePrefs.description: A menu gadget for displaying product information from Square POS
ModulePrefs.author: Revel Digital

Module.Content:
<style type="text/css">
        /*noinspection ALL*/
        html {
            width: __UP_rdW__px;
            height: __UP_rdH__px;
        }

        /*noinspection ALL*/
        body,
        app-root {
            background: transparent;
            width: __UP_rdW__px;
            height: __UP_rdH__px;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
    </style><link rel="stylesheet" href="https://ckosk.github.io/ang_gadget_test/styles.ef46db3751d8e999.css"><body>
    <app-root></app-root>
<script src="https://ckosk.github.io/ang_gadget_test/runtime.551a0941c4b2a21a.js" type="module"></script><script src="https://ckosk.github.io/ang_gadget_test/polyfills.3f30e99006756a31.js" type="module"></script><script src="https://ckosk.github.io/ang_gadget_test/scripts.ae6b62df363739b7.js" defer></script><script src="https://ckosk.github.io/ang_gadget_test/main.c55933670ee75109.js" type="module"></script></body>
